Class Digital

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--java.awt.Component
        |
        +--java.awt.TextComponent
              |
              +--java.awt.TextField
                    |
                    +--Digital
public class Digital
extends java.awt.TextField
implements Settable

This class provides a TextField that notifies an Observer when its value changes. It also implements an interface to change its value.

Only integer values in the range 0 to 100 are accepted by the TextField. Unacceptable values are simply ignored.

See Also:
Serialized Form
